feedback.name: Anonymous Participant
feedback.quote: This is very informative and beginner-friendly. The clear explanations with examples and hands-on exercises make learning effective and useful overall.

feedback.name: Anonymous Participant
feedback.quote: Useful and informative but can improve in timing.

feedback.name: Anonymous Participant
feedback.quote: Fantastic workshopâ€”clear, practical, and very well-structured. Covering everything from fundamentals to advanced agentic coding in a single day was impressive, and the team's effort in organizing the space and logistics made the experience seamless.

feedback.name: Kevin Tan
feedback.quote: The workshop gave a clear and practical view of how Playwright, AI, and modern testing frameworks fit together. It was hands-on and challenging, but very useful in understanding how testing is evolving beyond traditional automation. A good learning experience overall.

feedback.name: Magesh Kumar Chinnakannan
feedback.quote: Kudos to Syam, Akshay, and the TAQELAH team for an excellent session that seamlessly covered everything from fundamentals to advanced agentic coding in a single day. The workshop was well-structured, engaging, and delivered with impressive clarity. The effort put into the end-to-end experience, including venue and logistics, is truly appreciated.

feedback.name: Rashmi Sanjeev
feedback.quote: Very well organized and great workshop. The repo shared before the workshop was helpful to understand the basics and kickstart the 1-day session. All the topics covered and the lab sessions were really helpful and best was saved for the last - the agentic AI-powered coding. Thank you Syam, Akshay and taqelah team for this wonderful workshop!

feedback.name: Anonymous Participant
feedback.quote: Great content and presentation. Hands on exercise during the session gave more confidence to the audience.

feedback.name: Vaishnavi Suresh
feedback.quote: Found it incredibly insightful. The session provided a solid foundation and I especially appreciate the hands-on exercises that helped reinforce key concepts. I came with few knowledge on the topic but I left with a lot of knowledge and I can use those to improvise during my everyday work. Thank you Syam!
